long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is plain simple, it disconnects from sharepoint if the url contains "sharepoint.com" string and adds a "closeconnection.aspx?loginasanotheruser=true" to the url inside the current tab.

The extension is used when you need multiple environments for different clients and want to swap easily.
